website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede Classic Embossed is a refreshing take on the famous silhouette with its smooth nubuck leather finish and embossed Formstrip making the upper thicker and cozier. The classic good looks have been retained while the overall lightweight and cozy cushioning makes this an excellent shoe for everyday wear.Priced affordably at $70 per pair, this retro revival is an option to consider if one wants a new look to a classic without going over the top in the makeover.
pros: Many reviewers are impressed with the Puma Suede Classic Embossed’s smooth finish
Several customers are satisfied with it durable rubber sole that doesn’t swiftly wear out
A large number of comments noted the excellent fit of the sneaker that runs true to size
Numerous positive comments were posted about the color selections of the shoe
The lightweight midsole makes them ideal footwear for daily use
Some buyers find this low-top sneaker suitable for fall and winter because of its thick material
Quite a lot of customers disclosed that they get value for their money as the sneaker has a budget-friendly price
A few critics noted how the shoe doesn’t easily crease or wear out despite more than a year of use
The Puma Suede Classic Embossed has a comfy cushioning that doesn’t leave the feet tired after several hours of using the sneakers
A few observers see the sneaker as a premium shoe at a budget price because of its embossed detailing and branding details
cons: Shoes need a bit of break-in and a little wear for a few days before getting a snug fit
A few commenters noted the lack of consistency in comfort of some of the sneakers
Some users claimed that suede material could get difficult to clean after it gets too dirty

customer_reviews.title: You CANNOT beat the price...
customer_reviews.text: The color listed in the photo is incorrect, the shoe is an olive green color. It's a nice shade and will look great this spring and summer. The shoe runs a bit narrow, but that is the norm for Puma (at least in my experience whether basketball, running, or casual). I knew it would be a tight fit, but for the price (less than $30), I couldn't pass up for a pair of nice looking casual sneakers to wear once in a while.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Suede Classic Embossed-M Suede Classic Embossed
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the success of the German sports brand. As part of every street community from the 80's on, the suede has even been involved in historical matters on a global scale. The emboss pack include an embossed formstripe adorning the famous silhouette, a neat inclusion that will surely be popular with sneaker heads.
